channel.title: Charix's Infosec Blog
channel.description: Recent content on Charix's Infosec Blog

item.title: About
item.description: I hope to use this blog as a means of sharing and learning all things infosec. The main topics of the blog will (probably) be related to binary exploitation, pentesting and Windows internals. Thanks for checking it out. Feel free to mail me if you have any question or other inquires @ Rallem46123@gmail.com

item.title: HackTheBox: Calamity Privilege Escalation
item.description: HackTheBox is a service that offers a lab environment of vulnerable machines for people interesting in pentesting. Today I will cover the escalation of privileges from user to root on the retired machine Calamity. Debugging and Analyzing the Application Upon logging onto the machine we are presented with an application and its source-code. Before we analyze the binary, let’s have a look at what sort of protections we are dealing with.
